original: Yasmiṁ samaye arūpūpapattiyā maggaṁ bhāveti sabbaso rūpasaññānaṁ samatikkamā paṭighasaññānaṁ
analyzed: yasmin samaye arūpa upapattiyā maggam bhāveti sabbaso rūpa saññānam samatikkamā paṭigha saññāna

original: atthaṅgamā nānattasaññānaṁ amanasikārā ākāsānañcāyatanasaññāsahagataṁ sukhassa ca
analyzed: atthaṅgamā nānatta saññānam amanasikārā ākāsa anañcāyatana saññā sahagatam sukhassa ca

original: pahānā …pe… catutthaṁ jhānaṁ upasampajja viharati upekkhāsahagataṁ, tasmiṁ samaye
analyzed: pahānā pe catuttham jhānam upasampajja viharati upekkhā sahagata tasmin samaye
phassaḥ hoti pe avikkhepaḥ hoti pe

original: Yasmiṁ samaye arūpūpapattiyā maggaṁ bhāveti sabbaso ākāsānañcāyatanaṁ samatikkamma
analyzed: yasmin samaye arūpa upapattiyā maggam bhāveti sabbaso ākāsa ānañca āyatanam samatikkamma

original: viññāṇañcāyatanasaññāsahagataṁ sukhassa ca pahānā …pe… catutthaṁ jhānaṁ upasampajja
analyzed: viññāṇañcāyatana saññā sahagatam sukhassa ca pahānā pe catuttham jhānam upasampajja

original: viharati upekkhāsahagataṁ, tasmiṁ samaye phasso hoti …pe… avikkhepo hoti …pe…
analyzed: viharati upekkhā sahagata tasmin samaye phassaḥ hoti pe avikkhepaḥ hoti pe

original: Yasmiṁ samaye arūpūpapattiyā maggaṁ bhāveti sabbaso viññāṇañcāyatanaṁ samatikkamma
analyzed: yasmin samaye arūpa upapattiyā maggam bhāveti sabbasas viññāṇam ca āyatanam samatikkamma

original: ākiñcaññāyatanasaññāsahagataṁ sukhassa ca pahānā …pe… catutthaṁ jhānaṁ upasampajja
analyzed: ākiñcaññāyatana saññā sahagatam sukhassa ca pahānā pe catuttham jhānam upasampajja

original: viharati upekkhāsahagataṁ, tasmiṁ samaye phasso hoti …pe… avikkhepo hoti …pe…
analyzed: viharati upekkhā sahagata tasmin samaye phassaḥ hoti pe avikkhepaḥ hoti pe

original: Yasmiṁ samaye arūpūpapattiyā maggaṁ bhāveti sabbaso ākiñcaññāyatanaṁ samatikkamma
analyzed: yasmin samaye arūpa upapattiyā maggam bhāveti sabbaso ākiñcaññāyatanam samatikkamma

original: nevasaññānāsaññāyatanasaññāsahagataṁ sukhassa ca pahānā …pe… catutthaṁ jhānaṁ upasampajja
analyzed: nevasaññā nāsañña āyatana saññā sahagatam sukhassa ca pahānā pe catuttham jhānam upasampajja

original: viharati upekkhāsahagataṁ, tasmiṁ samaye phasso hoti …pe… avikkhepo hoti …pe…
analyzed: viharati upekkhā sahagata tasmin samaye phassaḥ hoti pe avikkhepaḥ hoti pe
